医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
心血管健康与少数群体的粮食安全状况密切相关粮食安全与理想心血管健康之间的关系，同时解决少数群体之间的差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/Cardioangio-health-is-intricately-linked-to-the-food-security-status-of-minoritized-groups.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/Cardioangio-health-is-intricately-linked-to-the-food-security-status-of-minoritized-groups.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=639d98f9-c5a7-409c-86e2-7fb98ff1c122 Tue, 07 May 2024 06:07:00 -0400 Cardiovascular health is intricately linked to the food security status of minoritized groups
维生素 D 受体多态性被发现会影响 COVID-19 的严重程度研究人员比较了轻度和重症 COVID-19 患者维生素 D 受体 (VDR) 基因中的 S​​NP。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/Vitamin-D-receptor-polymorphism-found-to-influence-COVID-19-severity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/Vitamin-D-receptor-polymorphism-found-to-influence-COVID-19-severity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a34db77e-9436-49b5-9c53-8d6d9c19e6e8 Tue, 07 May 2024 05:15:00 -0400 Vitamin D receptor polymorphism found to influence COVID-19 severity
药物辅助受孕与自然受孕：研究探讨儿童癌症风险自然受孕婴儿通过医学辅助生殖 (MAR) 所生的孩子患癌症的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/Medicically-aided-conception-vs-natural-conception-Study-explores-cancer-risk-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/Medicically-aided-conception-vs-natural-conception-Study-explores-cancer-risk-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=644b9994-5a86-4787-88c9-67592982f398 Tue, 07 May 2024 04:29:00 -0400 Medically aided conception vs. natural conception: Study explores cancer risk in children
研究表明，高度坚持地中海饮食可降低老年人的全身炎症高地中海饮食模式（MDP）依从性与低度全身炎症减少之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/Study-shows-that-high-Mediterranean-dietary-adherence-lowers-systemic-inflammation-in-elders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/Study-shows-that-high-Mediterranean-dietary-adherence-lowers-systemic-inflammation-in-elders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2631a9ff-5be2-4946-8848-79380c48b141 Tue, 07 May 2024 03:55:00 -0400 Study shows that high Mediterranean dietary adherence lowers systemic inflammation in elders
案例研究：大麻可能会减轻疼痛，但会加剧精神病！案例研究详细介绍了一名患有分裂情感障碍和纤维肌痛的 27 岁女性，她使用高效大麻来缓解疼痛，但出现了不良精神影响。为期一个月的降低游离谷氨酸的饮食改善了她的疼痛和心理健康，并让她戒掉了大麻，这凸显了大麻自我药疗治疗疼痛的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/Case-study-Cannabis-might-dampen-the-pain-but-amplify-the-psychosis!.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/Case-study-Cannabis-might-dampen-the-pain-but-amplify-the-psychosis!.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8156b37c-b8bc-4483-b7ca-330af70fede9 Tue, 07 May 2024 00:27:00 -0400 Case study: Cannabis might dampen the pain, but amplify the psychosis!
疫苗接种拯救生命 50 年：世卫组织的 EPI 拯救了 1.54 亿人的生命自 1974 年以来，世界卫生组织的扩大免疫计划 (EPI) 已避免了 1.54 亿人死亡，显着降低了全球婴儿死亡率，并因疫苗接种而贡献了 102 亿年的健康寿命。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/50-years-of-life saving-vaccinations-WHOs-EPI-saves-154-million-lives.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/50-years-of-life saving-vaccinations-WHOs-EPI-saves-154-million-lives.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aea223b1-aab8-4eef-8788-7b42223aa270 Tue, 07 May 2024 00:03:00 -0400 50 years of lifesaving vaccinations: WHO's EPI saves 154 million lives
研究将生命早期接触烟草与加速衰老联系起来，敦促采取预防措施《科学进展》最近的一项研究发现，生命早期接触烟草，包括在子宫内和早期开始吸烟，会加速生物衰老，强调了减少接触烟草对改善健康结果的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Study-links-early-life-tobacco-exposure-to-accelerated-aging-urging-preventive-action.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Study-links-early-life-tobacco-exposure-to-accelerated-aging-urging-preventive-action.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=18da75ed-c136-4343-aa48-a161ca636bb9 Mon, 06 May 2024 23:30:00 -0400 Study links early-life tobacco exposure to accelerated aging, urging preventive action
研究发现神经回路是人体免疫反应的关键调节因子《自然》杂志最近的一项研究揭示了体脑轴内的特定神经回路如何调节免疫反应，强调了免疫疾病的潜在新治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Neural- Circuits-revealed-as-key-regulators-in-bodys-immune-response-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Neural- Circuits-revealed-as-key-regulators-in-bodys-immune-response-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dbc73703-56b5-40b6-8a6b-4977002ee6d6 Mon, 06 May 2024 23:18:00 -0400 Neural circuits revealed as key regulators in body's immune response, study finds
新研究发现维生素 E 水平与骨关节炎之间没有因果关系最近的一项研究使用孟德尔随机化来探索骨关节炎 (OA) 和 α-生育酚（维生素 E 的一种形式）之间的联系，但没有发现两者之间存在因果关系的证据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/New-research-finds-no-causal-link- Between-vitamin-E-levels-and-osteoarthritis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/New-research-finds-no-causal-link- Between-vitamin-E-levels-and-osteoarthritis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7416fe13-fbc1-42d1-ae60-1dc1cf73a07e Mon, 06 May 2024 20:20:00 -0400 New research finds no causal link between vitamin E levels and osteoarthritis
促进癌症护理的公平性：NCI-DCC 社区外展和参与计划的经验教训丹娜—法伯癌症研究所的研究人员研究了国家癌症研究所 (NCI) 和国家癌症研究所指定癌症中心 (NCI-DCC) 的社区外展和参与计划的历史演变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Advancing-equity-in-cancer-care-Lessons-from-NCI-DCCs-community-outreach-and-engagement-initiatives.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Advancing-equity-in-cancer-care-Lessons-from-NCI-DCCs-community-outreach-and-engagement-initiatives.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b76a2943-f322-4a1b-82b2-0d459fe6f82e Mon, 06 May 2024 15:20:00 -0400 Advancing equity in cancer care: Lessons from NCI-DCCs' community outreach and engagement initiatives
